text: He ahale kitaba! Tomaloke nijara dharmata gulu nakaraiba (sima ceraa'i nayaba) arau allahara bisaye satyara bahirae ana eko nakaba. Mara'iyamara putra icha machiha kerala ejana allahara raachula arau te'omra bani, yito te'om mara'iyamara ocarata praerana karaichila arau te'omra taraphara paraa eta rauha. Seye tomaloke allaha arau te'omra raachulasakalara oparata imana ana arau tini buli nakaba, (ene ukti) paraityaga karaa, e'itorae'i tomalokara babe kalyanakara.
